roleset.name: cause a response
roleset.note: INSTIGATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'instigate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from instigate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: The Mahatma, or ``great souled one,'' instigated several campaigns of passive resistance against the British government in India.
example.arg: several campaigns of passive resistance against the British government in India
